about_the_game:
From Hero To Zero





You had it all as a big-time Cartel boss – respect, connections, more money than you knew how to spend. Sadly, your greed got the better of you. During a promising but risky drug exchange, things went sideways fast. Someone tipped off the feds, you got busted, and the moment your guard was down, your rivals tore into your network like vultures. This is the state of things as you first witness it when entering Drug Lord Simulator’s world.

Starting From Scratch





But you were too tough to see this as more than a mere setback. You picked yourself up, dusted yourself off, and began to rebuild your empire of narcotics. Use your knowledge of the business to establish a base of operations, creating a facility for growing your resources and making your product for later distribution. Manage the space available and outfit it with the equipment necessary to meet your current goals.

Plying Your Trade





When you have the drugs ready, it’s time to put them to work. Raise the influence of the Cartel, build up a network of dealers, launder money in a variety of schemes, and drive around to carry out smuggling runs. An unsuspected ally comes to your aid in your efforts – a faithful canine companion. With man’s best friend at your side, take advantage of his ability to sniff out cops or a poorly secured stash that could use a much more caring home.

Against the Odds





At some point you’ll think you’re ready to don your big boy pants again. Well, the world of drug trafficking will quickly verify that decision. As your operation expands, you’ll make more and more enemies among rival cartels and law enforcement. You have to offset the consequences by timing your activities, bribing government officials, and when push comes to shove, violently eliminating your competition. If you succeed, you’ll be rewarded with brand new drug markets around the world.

Clawing Back to the Top





Continue investing in your base, its equipment, your dealer network, and your global expansion. Fight off anyone who would stand in your way either by outsmarting them or subduing them with raw firepower. Soon you will regain your rightful top place in the Cartel as you achieve majority influence in the organization and dethrone your competitors. Just try not to get shot too much – it’s a rough line of work.

  • Sound Card: N/A

short_description: Production, dealing, and most importantly, raking in the big money. Drug Lord Simulator puts you in the front-row seat to a drug deal gone bad. With everything lost, you now have to make your way back to the top, starting with virtually nothing. That is, of course, if you survive the climb.

English*, German, French
*languages with full audio support
